mapper.sql: select r.id, r.resource_type, r.resource_id, r.knowledge_id, r.create_time, case r.resource_type when 'homework' then h.homework_name when 'question' then q.question_title when 'experiment' then e.experiment_name end as resource_name, k.knowledge_name from sys_teaching_resource_knowledge r left join edu_knowledge k on r.knowledge_id = k.knowledge_id left join sys_homework h on r.resource_type = 'homework' and r.resource_id = h.homework_id left join sys_question q on r.resource_type = 'question' and r.resource_id = q.question_id left join sys_experiment e on r.resource_type = 'experiment' and r.resource_id = e.experiment_id
